My iPhone is just an expensive imgur machine One of the greatest image sharing sites. Is it perfect? No, but nothing is perfect. The community is a vast in all aspects and walks of life. Together we laugh, cringe, get hit by the feels train, and wonder if we just watched someone die. However, it's also a place where you can go for advice as well as give it. If you have a problem ranging from needing a laugh, news, advice, or to vent imgur can help.
imgur is genius everyone loves cats, everyone loves funny gifs and fluffy puppies, but to creating app for this content requires a lot of passion and thoughtful work.

Sort by albums like the site! Honestly I use imgur to upload and store images from my computer and camera in a cloud, and the album sorting on the desktop site is so organized. On the app, however, you can only see your own photos through uploads and they are all unorganized in one never ending stream. The app would work much more efficiently if under the user tab, there was an "albums" tab rather than just "uploads"

Imgur makes my day... every day!! I spend at least an hour on Imgur every day after work. Favorite section is AWWW... washes any yuck from the day, away. And when my hubby gets home I make him watch all the new ones I've favorited (but I know he loves it :) don't discount the comments sometimes they are funnier than the post! Thank you Imgur for making my day, every day!!

Imgur is for life. I have been using Imgur for years. Imgur is a community. It entertains, educates, supports, and connects people from all over the world. I've never done much posting, but I've always enjoyed supporting and enjoying interesting content. When you're feeling brain dead or bored, the front page will always deliver. If you're feeling judgmental that day, head over to user submitted and get to work.

Don't want the app, don't want an account The latest changes made to Imgur as a whole are stifling and restrictive to its usability. Links on mobile devices will only open in the app. I can't access that link directly without signing into the app, and the mobile web site doesn't work unless an account is made and signed into.

Great app, some requests Great looking app, but could use a zoom feature for viewing images.  Screenshots of forum posts tend to have text that is too small to read at the standard display size, especially on a mobile device.

So unfinished it could have been an EA product. I don't understand how this app is getting so much praise in the reviews. Yes, it's good for viewing images already uploaded to Imgur, but it lacks even the most basic functionality that one would expect. I mean, there's no way to upload photos; hell, I can't even view my own photos on here, despite logging into my account. The app description says these features are coming, which leads me to wonder why the app was even released without them in the first place. There was absolutely no need to rush the app and leave basic functionality for later releases. Asinine.

Ignore the kids rating 1 star I enjoy the app for the fact I can share and comment about funny things, all the way to presidential candidates in other parts of the world. We have inside jokes which are great. The reason that some kids are rating this is one star is because imgur has officially released a statement saying that they will no longer be allowing NSFW (not safe for work) comments and replies.
My imgur experience I came to imgur a confused child. Lost in a world of memes, pictures of Michael cera, and gifs of all shapes and sizes.

Consuming!!!! This app consumes allot of my free time on breaks, lunch, after and before dinner. Waiting for people to be ready to go some place, etc.  I laugh, I share, I up vote and sometimes I cry a little.  The imgur community is the nerdiest, caring, passionate and down right funny people on the planet. I cannot thing of any app or group that has given me more enjoyment or entertained and educated me more than imugarians of which I'm proud do be one of.

Navigation less intuitive than before I'm not terribly fond of the current version. I re-downloaded after not using the app for several months. The navigation is now less intuitive, and if you search you can only view by most popular for that search, not most recent/etc. (or it's so hidden I couldn't find it).

This works fine for me! I'm kind of hestitate before downloading this since the review section goes full of ranting about ads problem. But honestly i did not even see a single ads since using this. My geological region (Vietnam) could possibly be the cause, nonetheless the app get a point for working smoothly, interactive UI, makes it easy to keep track with long comments thread.

Great time killer Honestly, I have been using Imgur for roughly two years now, great community, I have only had the app crash twice in those years but I see people complaining about the mobile site; I personally have had very few problems with it. The problems I have had have also been far between. So all in all great app and great community, I'd rate it a solid 5/7.

This shh is bananas (for scale) Have some spare time? This app is perfect for you! Need to write that paper that's due in 2 hours and you haven't even started yet? THIS APP IS FOR YOU! You're all alone and have no friends because you have no time to socialize with other humans because you'd rather lay in bed with your cat and look at your phone? THIS APP WAS CREATED FOR YOU!! so go ahead, download it, change your life, and eat a banana.

App opens constantly So say you're cruising around the internet, like say on Reddit, where every other link is to Imgur, and you click on a funny headline that links to a disappointing meme hosted on Imgur. This happens 40-70 times a day. After a recent update, instead of just quickly viewing the image in a tab in safari which you could close quickly, now the app opens up and you view it through the app. Meaning you have to close he app and go back to safari to continue your browsing. It's not a big pain in the tuchass, but after the 20th time, it adds up. I deleted the app.

too much thought on looks rather than function I never used the old app so I can't compare but I do browse the mobile site regularly. I do not like this app. I find myself using the mobile site. The app is too complicated which is frustrating. Commenting is difficult, after a bit of typing you can't see the rest of what you are writing. Also the app refreshes much too often. I'll be browsing the end of a gallery and suddenly find myself at the beginning. Finally, no matter what I do my notifications never go away. I think I'll stick the mobile site. Quite disappointed.

My only handle on reality I don't get to watch the news on tv or read the paper. So the only time I'm up to date on current events is on Imgur. Thank god for all those news reporters posting about Javert showing up all over the place. Or when the media sheds light on that Russian President, Dickbutt. And now I see John Travolta has finally come back from France to share his experience with us. God bless Imgur.

Easier to browse and then on my desktop I've actually been quite impressed by the regular updates to make the app the most viable it can be; while posting favorited images can be a bit tedious, browsing, leaving a comment, and checking out responses is quick and easy, possibly a better experience than my desktop in some cases

Excellent Imgur itself is fantastic, but the app works flawlessly.  Super easy to navigate, easy to post content, and they even fixed it so that if you're looking at a long post and accidentally swipe to the next one, you can swipe back right to where you were instead of back at the beginning.  Probably use this more than any other app.

Current Version is perfect This app is a great mobile adaptation of imgur, the simple image sharer. I mostly view images, and the app works very well for that. Old versions were bad about crashes and images not loading, but the newer version seems to fix these problems, as well as add neat features like double-tap to "up-vote" an image, and zoom, even for gifs.

Can't upload certain images. Some images i find won't show up on my camera roll for some reason. I think it's because they were from 2014 or something. So yea, I would be uploading a comic, but then some or most of the pages won't show up so it feels incomplete, and I can't find the reason why they won't show up.

App review First, this app can be simple or advance in which looking up images is easy and no trouble; in and out. Now what I mean in "advanced" is that user could me accounts, communicate, share pictures, like comments; ect. Some users might complain that it's buggy but it's all narrowed down to what device, software update and Internet. In all great image application 9/10

Words cannot express I'm giving it 5/7! And it's only because of imgur that I even understand what that means. imgur has saved me in my darkest hours when my needs to alleviate boredom have been at their highest: sitting in airports during layovers, waiting for friends to arrive, at my table in a restaurant before the food is ready, lying in bed when I can't sleep ... it's always there for me
Always gives you a chuckle I've been a user of this app for quite a while and have always loved the updates that have been put into it.

like Reddit, but gayer hey you kids like recycled memes and sanitized internet fun?!? oh boy, well I'll tell ya, imgur is where it's at. What, is that a misused confession bear? Oh wow cool! Mememememes! Maymays! Is that a pesky edgy opinion over there, lets report that so nobody gets hurt feelings. Wow cool. Hey another confession bear, whoa! Didn't see that comin!

A good start but not that great The app is a bit annoying to use. The swiping is far too sensitive so you often find yourself loading the next picture although you wanted to scroll down. Also, you can never read all the comments because those ads at the bottom of the app completely cover the "show more comments" button and you can't close the ads or anything. The whole app just is a bit choppy and not smooth at all.

UI functional but not very iPhoneish It's not the most amazing app on the store, but everything I tried to do with it worked pretty much how I expected. I suspect that the majority of the app is a webui wrapper like PhoneGap, since it lacks any native UI elements and triggers popup dialogs for things like choosing and taking photos.  URL text boxes are all far too small and drawer doesn't act like how a drawer should.

Good app when it's working It's a good app when it's working. I can browse popular photos, but it won't let me log in an see my own photos. When I try to use the Facebook login, it brings me to Facebook and back to the app but then it just goes back to the main page and doesn't actually log me in. Also, if it does actually work and log in, then it still forgets me the next time. I have to log in every single time I open the app. I wish it remembered me and my password.

Uploading does not function I use imgur on its website for the sole purpose of uploading unlisted images rather than browsing. I needed to do it on my phone and tried the app. It took me 5 minutes to upload 2 medium resolution images on Wifi. It kept retrying to re-upload, thinking that the upload failed. I checked my profile later on and realized there were around 5 duplicates of the same images.

5/7 I gave this a perfect score because it deserves it. I would like to see 3D-Touch implemented into the actual app so I can open links in a preview. But all around great so deserving of a perfect score, 5/7. I would like to see more plot, the storyline between posts was a bit hard to follow at times, sometimes the cooking detours add to the story and sometimes the plot becomes very sexual. All in all perfect.

A source for almost everything I love Imgur and use it as a source for everything funny and entertaining (and also informative). The imgur community is hilarious and people post some amazing things on there. The app makes it easy to browse through posts, gifs, and everything else. I'm constantly sending links to friends from imgur. Try it out and enjoy.

love this app despite its flaws I have enjoyed browsing through the app for its vast amount of content. However i the app has a few bugs. when running the app in the background then activating it again it has a tendency to either skip back to a previous post than intended or close the app entirely. i love the app and have been an imgurian for over 3 years but these bugs have put a damper on my experience

Came from Reddit, stayed for Imgur Used Imgur for hosting pictures for Reddit like a lot of people. Really liked the app and got a client on my phone but unfortunately it always logged me off. This was around the time the official app was out so I got it and it's overall a way better experience. I love it so much I almost exclusively use imgur on my phone. 5/5 will download again.

Where do I start? I love imgur it's a great distraction from being an adult but lately it's become crap. It started a few months ago when they brought in sponsored content which is fine, you gotta pay the bills. Then they added the ads below the posts which is again fine. Then most recently the app has had bugs, people have complained, more bugs are brought to light, more people complained and in the last week the only thing that's changed is now there are full screen ads that pop up, block the content, freeze the app, and that's just too far for me.

Ihm‚Ä¢ah‚Ä¢JUHR Ever want to check out those cool Facebook/Reddit/Chive/whatever-else-you're-into memes? There's an app for that. Bonus: it's FREE! That's right, no Loch Ness monster to charge you Tree-Fitty to use this app, so feel free to be the wonderful 'lurker' that you are, and browse the best image-based, voter regulated (no robots, I promise...probably) interweb image sharing site out there to your heart's content!

Uploading does not function I use imgur on its website for the sole purpose of uploading unlisted images rather than browsing. I needed to do it on my phone and tried the app. It took me 5 minutes to upload 2 medium resolution images on Wifi. It kept retrying to re-upload, thinking that the upload failed. I checked my profile later on and realized there were around 5 duplicates of the same images.

A lot better, but still needs work. Many of the bugs that I have encountered have been fixed. The user experience and UI are ten times better, but the grid view is poorly implemented. It doesn't make sense to click on a grid view image only to have to click on it again a moment later. It's redundant.

Great app I love imgur and the community. I downloaded the other imgur app first (big mistake) and had a lot of problems with it. Once I got this app though, which I didn't realize was the official app, all those problems were gone. This official app has caused no problems and the design is very easy to use. If you are an imgurian (chants one of us) then I would get this app. Enjoy!

When a Picture is Enough Imgur is a website of random images placed online by people world wide. News, jokes, facts, pranks, art, individual story's and more all in picture form. Simply swipe to the right to see the next image.

Great Community Knowing there's a reliable site to go to when you're looking for entertainment or support or whatever you can think of, really, makes life a little less dull. Content on Imgur makes me feel a variety of emotions and the community is great. The app works flawlessly on my iPhone 6s. No issues to report thus far. Try it out and post some OC (Original Content). üëç

Can no longer get it to work right. Loved Imgur, loved it! But this update now causes the combination of their "allow notifications" message and my keyboard to stop me from commenting or even backing out of the comment and just viewing the images on the app. This happens after I log in to comment, every single time since the latest update. Deleting and reinstalling several different times has not improved it.

App will not stop crashing Every time I try to upload a photo, it times out and I get an "upload error" message. When I hit "cancel" or "login," the app crashes. When I had the most recent previous version, I was constantly getting an "image not found" error message for new image links posted on Reddit. I wrote to complain, and, to the developers' credit, I received a reply within 24 hours, telling me to download the new version. Unfortunately, this one is at least as irritating and useless as the last one. I've about had it with this image host.

I lava imgur It's a great app, but it really should allow sharing from your own device or something. You can't upload pictures and post them from your phone in comments. You can do it for posts, but for comments you have to post a url. But I lava imgur and the app works as intended, just a suggestion for mobile users.

Imgur Is a great app!! This app is great you can choose all the options you want like the newest or you can search some memes or even other great things this app is a great app it has no ads for me which is great there are tiny little ads under the main thing that you are looking at but that is ok but overall this is a great app I am really happy with it

Can you just go back to being a hosting site. I don't need you suggesting images to me or telling me to look at the top gifs for the day. You're app is there to host images, not be some lame social media site or cut out the middle man from Reddit. The comment section is trash and the new thing where every image opens in the Reddit app with related images isn't what I want. I want to see the image the other user linked to me.

I've never written a review before this... Never have a written a review on an app. But the official Imgur app is so astonishingly abysmal that it had to be done. First off, it works ~50% of the time. Secondly, ~50% of the time it works only ~80% of all the features work. Voting won't work, or comments won't show. If I try to make a comment I can't see what I'm typing. Favorites disappear. Voting on comments/submissions are ALWAYS wrong. However, this app does do one thing without fail. It WILL crash at a minimum of once a day. If being nearly unusable was the Imgur teams goal for this app they achieved it, gloriously.

Top notch time waster Great way to pass the time, especially during those long toilet adventures after a night of Chipotle. Do yourself a favor and check out the user submitted section for the highest quality posts. Oh and I hope you like Michael Cera. I personally wish he would burn in a fiery supernova but you may get the right stirrings in your pantaloons over him.

Great app, just a few glitches. I really like the app now, it's not near as bad as it use to be. It sometimes shuts down, I don't know what causes it, and sometimes it freezes which doesn't happen often. The only problems other than glitches is there is no favorite folder and you can't reply with pictures or gifs. Other than that it's a good app and works smoothly for me.

10/10 would upvote Good app but they need to remove the download button when you select an image. It covers the image with no way of seeing through it half the time. It's annoying having to wiggle the picture around to see whatever is covered. Also if I swipe right or left on accident I want this app to remember where I was at not reset me to the top. God forbid it happen on a lengthy post.

Much better than previous versions, however... messaging is still left out. Fewer crashes and bugs, though! Good job imgur app team! It's coming along much better! I just wish I didn't have to open the desktop site to take advantage of all the features I wish I had on mobile such as messaging.

Imgur use to be cool My wife and I use to be entertained by laying around and surfing the content of imgur and laughing at all the stupid and corny content. Now however with the addition of these silly and intrusive adds i have deleted the app. They are so incredibly in your face. I tried to just ignore them but the placement is just awful.
I only have Imgur because of Reddit Good for image hosting, but as a social media platform? Meh.

Update Causes Problems I'm all for updates, really, but I think they should be properly tested before being deployed.  The recent update regularly breaks some functionality of the app.  Several times a day, comments and some images don't load because of a SSL error that never appeared in previous iterations.  The tags added just feels like more bulk, and when I'm browsing Usersub or Most Viral, I'm not looking at the tags, I am looking at the images.  Will return to this review if and when issues are resolved.

They listen, They improve I've been on several different image viewing apps such as this and spend time on Reddit or 4chan if I really care to and of all of them only Imgur has spent the time to improve itself and add core value to the platform.

Mobile only user I've only ever used Imgur on mobile to browse. I think it's a pretty swell app. There are glitches here and there but nothing that makes me upset. I have no suggestions for improvements and all updates are welcomed (except for the time they changed the colors of the upvote and favorites...that threw me off for a bit).
Cool first version but... I would like to be able to resize before uploading (800x600, 1024x768, etc)
So far, so good! I'd used Pocketgur for a while because it was the least buggy in terms of general use. Even then, gifs would constantly freeze and the app would crash when uploading a picture.

Service bar My only complaint about this app is the lack of a service bar on top. I would like to be able to see the time, especially after a long usersub marathon, and to make sure that I am still connected to the wifi. Maybe if this was a thing I wouldn't have stayed up for 3 hours longer than I should have last night... Otherwise a great app!

Great app for a great site I love imgur and have been browsing for years. Of course the app has some troubles where it'll crash from time to time, but every app does. The fact that people get so angry about it is stupid. The app does what it needs: browsing, commenting, and posting. My only complaint is that PMs aren't a thing, but that's whatever. Great app, and I do recommend it.

Delightfully surprising It works better than I expected it to. I love the way I click on an image and I have the option to save that image or flick it away and see it fly away - more than I expected from this app. If I want to share a post, it's super easy. I'm also impressed by the quality of posts on here as opposed to Reddit or Facebook. Happy.
Worth the wait They sure took their time creating an imgur app for the iPad, but it was time well spent.

Almost as good as the website Mature filter causes some havoc, which is Apples fault not Imgurs. Between Apples requirement and the soft underbellies of those who think they are going to save the world by whining it has a slight impact. Overall a great app.

#1app Hi,this is the only app I need in my iPad mini..yup love it and it's free,can not beat that,thanks creators,it's funny but ever since I read some of the reviews about how bad the pop up ads are,I'm starting to notice them now,before I read them,never even noticed,wow people,it's free,why complain,they need to have the app supported somehow,are you giving them any money?
This is a review of the app, not of imgur in general. It's good. Still could be better. Mine does not crash or anything of the sort.

Forcing me to make account I used the app previously and never had an issue, but now when I open the app on my new iPhone it wants me to put in an email, login with facebook, or login with google in order to get past the welcome screen...

It's not terrible App works pretty well for the most part but it crashes intermittently.  Also, when I am commenting the area that shows what I'm writing will disappear sometimes and all I'll see is the keyboard and other comments or gray above it. I can still type and still post what I type...I just can't see it while typing.  Lastly, please update so I can check messages from the app and not have to sign in through my browser.

It's pretty dank I don't see the spooky problems that everyone else complains about, besides the Over Capacity thing and not being able to see your comments being typed (sometimes).Gifs buffer just as much as they do on a computer, unless if im on data and not wifi. I would also like to be able to search subreddits. Other than that, the app is gud: love the gallery view!

What the hell imgur?!? This most recent update was supposed to fix a crash for people that couldn't open the app a few times and some other fixes. But now it won't open at all!!! You made it worse while trying to fix it. When I can get on again I'll update my review, but for now it's complete trash

Pretty dank I love it and the rest of the day after a long day at the same thing to say it is not the same thing to say it is not the best thing of my favorite song thing part of is that the same time as the same most of the them and the they have been in the world morning in the world morning first

Improvements have been made The app has come a long way since I first downloaded it. I give it 5 stars because I use the app daily and enjoy it. It needs to have messaging and there are a couple bugs with tapping on links in comments. Other than that, A+. I'd give the app 2 thumbs up. Nice work. Keep it coming.

Imgur = my addiction With great websites come great responsibility... to make a good app! Only downside is not being able to /r/ some of my favorite subreddit collections from the app. Keep up the good work and if you are new to imgur stop wasting your time reading the reviews and just install it. Before you know it you will be... one of us. One of us.. one of us...

It finally has messaging (again)! For me, Imgur is all about the community. Now that you can finally message users, like you can in browser, the whole experience is complete! I've lost contact with so many people since there was no mobile messaging and they never went on their PCs.
All your productivity belongs to the gur! This is a great site, and app. I've not seen the server full screen in awhile, and new features do become available eventually.

Best anti-productive time wasting app ever. I have been a member of Imgur for a few years now and I absolutely love it. Always has new content, and I can see quality memes before they make their way to Facebook. This app is great especially compared to the earlier versions. The imgur team has been efficient with debugging and improving the app.

Annoying Through pop-ups and manipulative website design, forced me to sign up to the website to read a simple article a friend sent me. Get all the way out of here with that nonsense. Deleted the app as soon as I read the comments section of the article. Poor content and you guys are terrible.
Awesome, but buggy I love this app. It makes it so much easier to stay up to date with the Front Page. I do have a few suggestions, though.
Functionality? So, what did you do to images and albums menus?

Much App. Such Wow. Imgur is the best gallery app available today. Its simple to use and fun to check everyday. The content is never stale and the community of users amplifies the experience altogether. It offers continuously updated images, GIFs, and videos.
+5 for the Community. +3 for the app. Imgur is an awesome community of punsters, bleeding hearts and nut jobs who have big hearts and creative minds.

Big step backwards Never written an app review before, logged in because I hate the new version so much. The "new look" feels cheap and already outdated. I thought the old visuals were way better. Don't like the placement of the voting buttons, and I hate the loss of the ability to jump straight to the comments.

This is pretty much the only app I use If I'm on my phone there's a 90% chance that I'm on imgur. The only reason I'm rating 4/5 is because there's still no messaging. If I want to talk to someone, I have to switch between the app and the website. Which admittedly isn't a huge issue, except the mobile website is constantly telling me it'd be easier for me to use the app... So.. Yeah.

You know why you're here Just download it, you won't regret it immediately, but 4 years later when it's ruining all of your friend and relationships because you do nothing but browse Imgur every chance you get then you probably will but at least you'll have Imgur to keep you entertained.

Excellent and Keeps Getting Better So good it'll make you late for work because you can't stop looking. It takes only a short time to become addicted to the fine wit and humor shared. Sure, there's plenty of nonsense folks attempt to post, but Imgur's well-crafted upvote/downvote system enables Darwin's theory to play out rather quickly.

One of my favorite apps! I've seen some other reviews, and I have no idea what they're talking about. Imgur is great! You just swipe to the next one, tap on a picture to zoom in, double tap to upvote, and it's like its own culture. It's very entertaining to see all the awesome stuff on there! It's easy, and the posts are actually entertaining.
Imgur This is a great program.  Been using it for a year.  But it's starting to get really really bad.  Allot of gamers have recently

not terrible, but awaiting improvement I like most of the app. I like the sliding, though most of the time, longer posts are irritating to exit. Subreddit browsing is one of the main reasons I'm going to continue using a different app for now, but if you're not interested in that, this app is great. With more added features, this app could become my go-to for time wasting.

Like Fine Wine This app has only gotten better with each successive update. Whether I'm at my computer or on my phone, browsing imgur is one of the best parts of my day. The fact that there is such a streamlined and user friendly application makes it all that much more enjoyable! Definitely download this app!

I love this place! I only discovered this site a few months ago, as I was browsing some other sites. I absolutely love it!! It's full of all kinds of pics, memes, tons of pets with a strong love of cats, uplifting stories, controversial opinions, but most especially the people who comment. I love reading the comments. Definitely download the app but get get ready to become addicted. Happy browsing future Imgurians!! :)

Best update, in my opinion. I never liked using the app until now. They've done a good job making it it better each update. They've finally seemed to work out all of the glitches (or all that I've seen), which was the biggest thing holding me back from using it in the past.
Revised: Latest Update Breaks GIF Searching Update: Now, it just crashes immediately upon opening. Guess that GIF viewing issue doesn't really matter if it won't open at all.

My life will never be the same My god... I've always been a mobile user. Since I downloaded this in 2014, my life has been absorbed by this app. Asdfghjl of my friends say I have the dankest memes. It's great at filling in the void at night as I fall asleep in bed alone!

from dank to stank The app itself is pretty stable relax in the central features from the website. To be short it's just in complete. My biggest issue is not with the app directly but the community that has been building up around it in the last few months. The site and by extension app is full of white supremacistsand can you content has been reduced to just stupid repost and occasional alt right propaganda. The filter out pornography but not hate speech? Imgur you have to do something about your failing community. Ya'll have become worse than 9gag.
Great app--& improved First, a disclaimer: Imgur is biasing the reviews. The app asked what you think of it, and I gave it five stars, and then it said would you review Imgur on Apple!

Can't Save Images/Gifs A very basic feature has been removed. You can no longer save a gif to your phone. Sometimes I want to use the gif in a text chat, but don't want the associated title or comments. Imgur has slowly locked us into viewing the content in the most inconvenient way.

Good app, use to be good community It's a good app, and use to be a great community. However their servers have been overwhelmed lately and the site has been overrun with snowflake liberals. No fault to the creators, it use to be entertaining and not so political. But I guess these lunatics are everywhere now, sorry I had to delete account I spent many hours on it.

Ugh When the app works like it should it is a competent and worthy app, but that rarely happens. App crashes way too often requiring the user to force close it. Logs the user out randomly. The favorite button pretends to function properly until you check back later and realize it did not save your favorite, even worse when it deletes previous favorites. Maybe the next update can fix the more glaring issues and I can give a better rating.

Now will you leave me alone and let me browse Imgur!? Ok, the Imgur people won't leave me alone until I give a review. It's glorious, thought provoking, hilarious, full of cats, and if there is a god he would deem it good. I'm a proud Imgurian of three years, and I proclaim this without shame. My son loves Reddit, and deems Imgur inferior. It's a shame he will be going to hell instead of heaven like me, I will miss him.

Loving imgur This review is long overdue, but better late than never. This app is seriously part of my nightly ritual. I love the funny, insightful, and weird things I see here on a daily basis. It's a great community with truly awesome people. I love sharing their hilarious content with friends and family. At a minimum it's a great way to kill a few minutes in line at the DMV.

(Insert Imgur joke here) Great community, loads of new posts all the time. Was using three different funny picture sites to try to sate my voracious appetite for the dankest of memes. I am now proud to call myself an Imgurian. Oh, the app? It's fine. Works well for me. Gets me by. Sometimes .gifs take a bit, but ehh, still better than a lot of garbage out there. 5/7

not for iPad mini! i love this app but it isn't formatted for an iPad mini, in fact you cant even get one thats formatted for it, so when using it when i comment i can only see what the first line i have written says since its in the app formatted for the iPhone. maybe i should try it through my browser.......

Please bring back shortcut to comments at bottom! I really miss the little comments bar at the bottom of long posts, where instead of scrolling through a ton of pictures to view or write a comment, you could just tap it and it would jump to the comments. Sometimes with these "dump" posts with 100 pics, I'd like to see the comments, but don't want to spend 30 min scrolling though all the pics! Please, please bring back that feature.

Support the websites important to you I appreciate imgur's efforts to provide a stable app and clean user experience across a massive data-heavy platform. The ads are a necessity, as most core users will not pay to sustain the cost of paying staff and upgrading servers and software. Imgur provides all users with plenty of shareable and enjoyable content, and the app is great!

Entertaining! I love Imgur and have used the website for four years! When I found out they had an app I quickly downloaded it. The best things about the app is that it is more convenient, still just as entertaining, and you can carry it around with you everywhere!

Imgur is simply the best social network If you want to see what will be making people laugh on Facebook in 3 months than join Imgur and become an imgurian. We are a community that shares the best images on the internet and we have some of the funniest people commenting on the best images. You will laugh, learn, and share.

TL;DR : stop redirecting me to the App Store and loading related pictures when I click on something Imgur is an image hosting site. It's where bigger websites like to host their images but for some reason they have formed a community, all the while pretending like they are really important. Now the website thinks it's important and forces any link from another site to redirect to the App Store. First, I already own the app, second why tf would I EVER need to do that to see a simple picture of a cat. Get over yourself so I can change this review to a positive one

Love it, but needs improvement The app is great for the most part. Some minor bugs for me include the loading animation not going away, and when I try to refresh the gallery, it will freeze at a blank screen. Also, I am not a fan of the direct image link coming up after you 'click' the image. I am constantly bringing it up by accident.

Good job, Sarah! Excellent app for Imgur and a welcome alternative to mobile. I would really like to be able to copy gifs from the app, I want to be able to paste my favorite gifs into my text messages while using the app, instead of having to switch to mobile. Great format, very pleasing to my eyes and fingers. That is all. M'ladies.

Long Time Lurker Been lurking on imgur for a few years now, even got a few friends who lurk too. One day I'll post something but if it doesn't make it to the front page I might die so I'm still lurking. The app is awesome. Don't download it unless you want to lose large parts of your day to chuckling and reading silly comments. UPVOTE HYPNOTOAD!

Overall a great app for imgurians It has it's downs, sometimes logs me out and might crash occasionally but overall it's great for me. My main complaint is that it often restarts at the beginning of the front page when I left off 100+ deep in a browse. Thanks, imgur for the constant work on improving this app!

Think it's awesome I am enjoying this app it works fine for me no complaints. The community is great for this app wether it's funny stories, amazing views from mountains, hilarious memes, funny gifs, or interesting facts. It has a unique community that makes this app the greatest. This app makes me smiley everyday and gives me something to do in the middle of class.

Uninstalling Used to be 5 stars. Then the updates got worse. Then ads. The app has been ruined by corporate greed and monetization of work that other people produce. Ads on every image? Look at the reviews. This app has already lost probably around 1,000 users from what I've seen posted elsewhere. Every other 'update' since around December has been messing with the UI anyways and making the app harder to use. Unsubscribe from to the feed to my inbox as well so I don't start reviving promotional spam. Go eat a  five pound bag of sugar free Haribro Hellbears.

Yes sereeee So many people are hating on the new update that added ads. Yes, ads are a little annoying, but if you want to not have to pay for the app then let the ads happen. Imgur has a great community and a lot of good original content. If you're looking to see if you should get this app, I say you should.
Imgur is a blast I would love a few more features added to browse (and search) for specific subs and users, but that being said it works great for what is currently setup.

My time... Where has it gone This is objective, but the alphas made it incredibly easy to do almost all functions available online with a standard web browser, also loads Gifs without being video and that's great for my music listening and meme viewing, Kudos imgur team.

How did this app get made? Sure, maybe this isn't the best app on the iPhone... if you're a dummy. Nothing gives you more meaningless information, full of a bunch of horny kids posting crab, and people repeating the same comments over and over to pretend they are witty. But guess what! That's why we love it. 5 Stars

Mostly awesome Doesn't crash as much anymore, but when leaving multiple comments in a chain under your own original comment [(1/2), (2/2), etc.] the later comments don't show up to other users. Also sometimes gifs don't play, there seems to be no rhyme or reason determining which ones work and which ones don't.

Learning something new. I personally like to think of Imgur as sort of bits and pieces of every other social media or blog out there. From sharing photos to life hacks, Imgur literally has every type of category to share photos, memes, gifs and short videos for everyone to see. It's truly an awesome place to be.
Now I can have no life everywhere I go! Awesome app. Latest update fixed the login bug I whined about, and now I'm back to wasting countless hours on imgur.

Nothing is perfect... I LOVE this app. I never review any of my apps when they ask. And people usually only tell you the bad things. I love this app. I can search what I want. I have often googled the shorthand terms they use, but I have a bad memory I want a cheat sheet! That's all I would fix. It's a great app, and it has yet to freeze on me!
Much better. This is a much more fluid, intuitive version of the app that went back to the drawing board.

Open in app button When I open an imgur link from a text message it opens in safari but then I press the "open in app" button and usually it will open imgur then jump to what I was looking at. But now it just opens the app and doesn't jump to the link I was looking at.
Where to start? 1) Introducing promoted posts to the app with this update?!  Is there no depth to which Imgur team won't stoop?

Much better now I had to delete the old app since it froze so often and just wouldn't seem to work. Now, it works great and I can stay logged in. Loads very quickly and is extremely easy to navigate to whatever page I want to view that day. Five bananas.

I used to be cool... What have you done?! I have lost countless hours... days? months?... I can't sleep without it . My wife has joined in as well. It's like the best of the Internet all packaged and brought to you via one convenient little package. No need for news or blogs... news travels here faster than other places. üê± tax.

Are you a lurker? Let's face it y'all we need to constantly e entertained and feel connected to other with similar interests. Do you like having the power to make post rise and fall? Do you like seeing the latest gifs, memes, and stories? Well Imgur is for you! Let's be real y'all it's a repost and OC paradise. üçå for scale 5 outa 5

Can't put it down! It would have been all to easy to just build an Imgur timeline and call it done. Instead the new Imgur app delivers an immensely satisfying experience through a number of very well thought out and well executed interactions. The only problem is I can't put it down!

Awesome layout This layout is crisp and cool and a lot of flow. I am on user sub a lot and the refreshing is neat but I feel as though I miss a lot of content on the front page. Did you block the cross posts from reddit? I thought we were their sister or kid or something so why no more sharing? But I think it's very innovative. Go Sarah!!!!

A much nicer but somewhat buggy app but missing share sheets This is a nice update. A lot more functionality. Nice layout and UI changes. Seems a little buggy at times. I'm most disappointed that they didn't take advantage of share sheets so you have to go into the app to upload photos instead of being able to do it from the photos app. Hopefully this will be coming down the line.

Fast, better, stronger Everything loads much faster. The imgur team is really getting their stuff together, lately. Within the past year, this app went from being the worst imgur content viewer to (arguably) the best. It's great to see this much improvement in a relatively short amount of time.
Almost perfect Love this app. Two things I would change:

Open in app from Facebook not working Love the app, I used to be able to go from Facebook with the "open in app" button, but for the last few months it just takes me to the App Store for the app. Don't know if it's a Facebook issue or an Imgur issue. Not a game changer, just my thoughts

Best app. Great community. 5/7 stars I've used Imgur since about 2012. It's gotten me through an entire military enlistment. I turn to the people and content to make my day lighter and it never fails. No where else have I found inside jokes and running humor to be so prevalent and open for everyone to enjoy.

Super stuff The app is super because I can leave the desktop version and go to different parts of my house and cry, while still browsing user-sub and downvoting anything except cats and boobs and cats and boobs and cats and boobs and cats and boobs, you get the idea even if I've used only 2 punctuation marks in this entire review. 3. 4. CRAP!!! 10.

Awesome, Fun, Everything in Between I've surfed Imgur for years now and love it. The next thing that would make it even better is if we Imgurians could personalize our favorites so we could have folders for recipes, history, etc. That's the next big thing I hope they will do.

Good app, but too much porn I like the app a lot, don't get me wrong. But I can not possibly understand why the admins allow borderline pornography to be on the front page 9 times out of 10. It's ridiculous and makes me not even want to go on the app, which is why I mainly use IFunny. I love the interesting stories and meme dumps on Imgur, but if I wanted to see porn/ pornstar recommendations I'd go to a much different website.

Crisp and clean Great app! Gifs load as you scroll and pause when you scroll past each one, so a gif series loads super quick. The layout is appealing to the eye. I really appreciate that posts fill up the entire screen without the use of borders. Just needs a button for instant cat pics. üò∏üëç

Needs Optimizations & Stability Improvements Imgur has potential, but every time I open the app it always says "No internet connection" or "Connecting to network". I have great internet starting at 60mbps and should have no issues with connectivity. The other problem is whenever I try to upload an image the app completely crashes after I select the "Next" button. Please address these two issues and I will rate 5 stars. Thanks.

CRASHES STILL! Come on guys, it's been a while. But this app still crashes more often than my grandma driving on her way to church. I open it up, look through three or four images and it crashes. Also, instead of buffering gifs, they just shouldn't play until their loaded all the way through.

Solid Interface - Small Room for Improvement The interface is easy to learn and smooth to the touch. However, it could deal with higher download priority to animated pictures than trying to download everything at once, and there is no current way to explore subreddits through this app.

Works great I didn't think Imgur could work well on mobile but this totally does!  Only thing I would ask for is the ability to sort my own posts or those of another user by most points.  This is useful on desktop and would be useful here

Wow, Ipad update is amazing Was not expecting this ipad update, but its awesome. Ive had the imgur app since it came out and this is great. The ipad update completely changes the interfacae. It has multitasking capability. There is a left side to scroll through the front page and you can swipe on the right side. This is great. üôåüëçüòÑ

I love this community I personally love the adds and the community. Everyone is complaining about adds and I don't mind them. How else are they gonna get the money to pay the staff and keep on adding more features. Its business after all. I still love and support this app.
Cannot upload from storage providers As far as I can tell this app only allows you to upload photos that are saved in your camera roll.

One step forward, two steps back With the new update, every time I respond to a text or receive a call and go back to the app, it opens back to the very top of Most Viral or User Sub and have to scroll back down to find my place. Also, when you tap on a pic/gif to expand it and double tap to zoom in, it closes the picture or gif. The previous version worked great but this new one is getting very aggravating to use.

I'm too lazy to make up a title Before Imgur, I never thought I could meet people as lonely and pathetic as me while at the same time seeing the same post 20 times in an hour and reading about the same news event 50 times in a day, 10/10 would recommend

First step.. In theory this app looks beautiful. But as someone that's been using the Imgur Browser app, I find the official one quite lacking. First problem comes with commenting as when I try to the keyboard hides what I'm typing. Second I like having a grid view to browse through occasionally. Also the simplistic look is great until you get into interacting with the post as it feels better to look at than interact.

can't upload images What's the point of an image sharing host if you can't upload images? you would think having the app would be a convenient way to post funny pictures you took on your phone. You would be wrong. There's no uploading function at all. If you want to browse Imgur and not post it doesn't work that great either. What's the point? Stick to the browser version of the site because this app is useless for folks who want to use the image host to host images.

Imgurian for life If you've ever had issues with the old apps (if you haven't then you never had the old apps) look no further. This one is nice. The only complaint I have is you can't post gifs and you can't edit the images after posting them.

Previous version was better So cool, elegant and pretty convenient way to browse, laugh and interact with fellow Imgurs while witness new memes born and die. If only there was an iPad version of it...

Swipe down gone I will say the swipe down feature was a lot easier to use vs having to hit the back arrow. I really don't see the use of swiping down to refresh the page on the app. Flat UI is not really visually appealing to me, but most people like it.

I would give this 5 stars Ever since the most recent two updates I haven't been able to see the points on comments and I cannot see the comments that reply to the original comments. I love the comments so this is a big issue

Okay let me advise you about thingd Great app. Its alright tbh but there are some things that make me rate it a 3 star. Community is creepy and can be extremely depressing at some points. Reposts are common so get used to seeing things over and over again (isn't necessarily a bad thing since there are some great reposts). Thats basically it though. Community can be really good though and fun to start a conversation with. Just tread lightly.

I love this app. I'm addicted to imgur and this app works well for everything on imgur. Almost always works flawlessly. The only complaint that I have is I randomly won't be able to save certain images for some weird reason, but that is a very small complaint. Imgur is awesome.

Solid app I don't have any particular issue. Sure the ads are annoying but at the end of the day imgur needs to make some money and I'm not planning on paying to use imgur so it makes sense the ads are there. Other than that everything loads nicely.

Need ability to set default starting catergory The newest version no longer saves the category that you were last on. I like starting on the Funny tab but now it defaults to Most Viral every time I open the app. Please give us the ability to set a default starting category. Other than that pretty good app.
Needs more thought Poor layout, not easy to download all moving funnies. Constant refresh and no caching while scrolling leads to slow experiences. Doesn't support browsing other subreddits.

Definition of a Love/Hate relationship I love this app, I really, really do. I hate it though because it's so easy and convenient that I forget what I am doing and lose whole chunks of my day and drain my phone battery. I am constantly deleting and downloading the app. 5/7 recommend üòè

Infuriating Absolutely dumbfounded by the developers decision to make the default upload to an album?? The only reason I use imgur is to be able to upload quick pictures I can get a direct link to so that I can quickly post them on the Internet. I have looked all over the app and there doesn't even seem to be an option to get a direct link for the picture anywhere. I'm not logging into the web browser site to do the simplest task the app could possibly have

Good but... I like the app and it works pretty well, but I have one big issue. When I go to my own account, and then go to the uploads section as if it was the actual website version, I cannot just view my albums. There are just my images that I uploaded unsorted and without being in albums. This would be a great fix if you could manage to do so. Otherwise it's a good app.

Automatically redirects any imgur to app, but doesn't even show the image If I try to click on an imgur link in chrome, it redirects to the app, where the image doesn't even appear, it's just the main screen of the app. Imgur is an image hosting site and with the app installed I can't even see linked images in a standard web browser.

Funny people who make you want to kill yourself Imgur has some of the funniest people in the world. But don't ever try to create things to post on the site. They'll never be good enough. People will only down vote you. And ultimately it will just be one more place that you weren't good enough.

Imgur for everyday memes and gifs This app has brought much into my life. Memes, confessions of strangers, and gifs. A lot of fun. I just wish the copy and paste feature was available, instead of just link pasting I wanna copy and paste the pictures or gifs sometimes and the mobile browser version does that while the app does not.

Really in love Have to say, I've fallen in love with Imgur in the past year. I was using the non official app for a bit, but with the recent updates on this one, it does everything you want it to do. Nice and stable. Easy viewing of comments, automatically loads image comments.

Imgur Is the best social media app you'll use. Everything from cats, to video games to home DIY to original content. Imgur has a (mostly) friendly community, and you'll actually feel like to posts come from the posters and are not copy and pasted from other sites.

Great for Filling Time Imgur is an awesome way to pass time in short bursts. Excellent for when you're waiting for an appointment, waiting for restaurant seating, etc. I'm waiting to be seated at a restaurant as I write this, lol!

Pretty awful I love imgur but this app is pretty terrible. It freezes all the time and I have to stop the process then rerun it constantly. It lags quite often. Commenting is difficult sometimes. Might just try pocket imgur pro instead. Seems far superior. Hey imgur step it up a bit.
It's what we wanted I love the new app. When it crashes, or goes to the home screen, rather, it puts you right back where you left off.

Love Love imgur and love the mobile app. Love being able to quickly search reaction gifs and send them straight to my text messages. I wish there was a way to access my uploaded images (not published images) as I use that to host my specific reaction gifs, etc.

Awesome This app is great. Well it's functional but Imgur as a site is amazing. So I will give you 5 stars for two reasons. Reason one, so the "Rate our App" pop up stops. And two, because you guys deserve it, you've given me much pleasure through out however long I've been using y'all.

+1 for title Great app, gets better with every update, a little confusing if you switch from app to desktop because it doesn't all work the same but it's not that big of a problem. Yeah it's your fabulous, screwy, cat taxing imgurians. It's just in a convenient data-saving app form.

Annoying and filled with bugs I've been using it for a while now, I absolutely hate it. You want me to turn on notifications? Why? your an image sharing website! Why would I need to be notified about anything! Please do something about it, every time I open the app I always get a window to turn notifications on. I don't want to turn it on and you can screw off on getting ratings as well! This is honestly annoying.

Excellent App. Having the ability to browse imgur easily and with extra features for mobile is pretty great. I find myself opening this app, and then closing it, and reopening it when I'm bored. Also being able to copy gifs and send them via iMessage is great!

Pretty good app, pretty bad community The app has only crashed on me once or twice and I've used it for a long time so it is made very well. The main problem is that the community is pretty bad. It's not that I made a poorly received post and am salty about it (I never made an account, just lurked), it's that the front page/trending section is 90% funny gifs but 10% soft core porn, anti social justice and anti-BLM memes.

A little of everything Imgur offers a little of everything. Although I do enjoy getting laughs out of a good joke every now and then and that's exactly what you'll get with this app! I definitely recommend for any chap that likes a good giggle every now and then.

5 Bananas Get this app, m8. It's not for the faint-hearted, but then you're not a milk-drinking pansy are you? You can take it. And you should. Your sanity may suffer, yes. You may develop something the doctors may term "crippling social anxiety", but what do the white-coats even know. Get this app. Your future self is already thanking my past self.

Wish it was better I too am having a lot of issues with getting this to work consistently with the IPad. Sometimes when uploading the screen just goes black. It is often slow to respond. Some images say they were successfully uploaded then disappear from the gallery. Hope they can fix, would be very handy app.

Love it! I much prefer the app over the mobile site. My only issue is that you can't save the gifs or pictures found in the comment section, which are usually the best part. The app runs great; I've never had an issue with it. I love this site so much!!

Doesn't keep your place in the feed When I first installed this app, it rarely crashed. When it did, it remembered my place. Now it crashes all the time, forgets which image I was viewing and worst yet, runs slower than my obese cat. THANKS OBAMA

Latest obsession My 3-month-old keeps me up at nights less than Imgur does. It's so hard to stop. Maybe the best part is the comments. Those have renewed my faith that there are clever, hilarious people out there, who not only GET IT, but who can bring it to the next level.

Love imgur Ever have one of those days where you just need a laugh or a little inspiration? Look no farther! Imgur gives you both (and usually at the same time) for free! Can't get enough of it. Thank you imgur for making my work and sick days a little bit brighter!

Up-vote! ‚¨ÜÔ∏è I have been a lurker on imgur for a long time and after using this app, I finally created an account. It's so easy to use, is really responsive and fast overall, and occupies a spot next to my most used apps. 10/10 would install again.

Imgur 5ever!!! I waste so many of my waking hours on the Internet, much like the other denizens of this community, I'm sure. This has been such an improvement for my mobile Imgur experience. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is due to a slew of unexpected app crashes. Otherwise, a great interface for perusing the interwebs.

Good for the Chuckles I have wasted so much time on this app, it's not even funny.     Like when you're sitting on the toilet and you open it up for just a second...   Next thing you know, you've been in the bathroom for 30 minutes and your legs are asleep.

Imgur is great! Hey guys, imgur is truly a fantastic app. It is so helpful being able to just upload a picture to be website without a big hassle. No account? No worries. -- Also, the animations are very cool. You can tell that the imgur team really does care about design of their app. Thanks so much!! 5/5

Great for time wasting Great when there is nothing to do, or something to do and you want to procrastinate until the last possible minute but not feel like you could've done something better with your time!

Did...did anything change? I stupidly got my hopes up that this app had been fixed. It looks the same and runs the same. Which is not very well. It still crashes every 7 pictures, give or take. It still resets to most viral/popularity when I'm trying to browse user sub by newest. Seriously, you overhauled the app 2 updates ago to what? Make the app unusable? This was a waste of time. It doesn't perform better. It's the same buggy, unappealing, and unusable app it was last time.

Stick with the web browser Interface is sluggish. Cannot quickly return to "home". You must back out each level. The whole image does not appear on the screen. You see the top left portion and have to click on it to see the whole image. Movement through pictures is not a swipe gesture as the rest of the world uses. One swipe of the finger and ten submissions whiz by. Never could get a GIF to load. I tapped, double tapped, hit the GIF button, cussed at the screen.

Fun but buggy It would be nice if I could close out of posts without having to exit the app. The "x" button never seems to work. Also, I would suggest an option to allow you to save your place when you close down the app so you don't lose where you were scrolling before. Overall, the UI is smooth and content is good as always.

No huge problems, works fine for me. I know some folks report having issues with the mobile app, but it's been working fine for me personally. Imgur keeps releasing updates improving the mobile experience and I couldn't be happier.

It just bothers me That it keeps asking me to rate it. Yes, it's good. It's a time killer and I don't get that stupid over flowing or whatever message whenever I'm on the desktop version of it. Which is nice. Anyway I'm hoping it stops asking me to rate it here. The message after bums me out so I'm hoping it's gone.

5/5 stars This is a great app for people who like to procrastinate. It's honestly a great way to waste time and it is easy to spend hours browsing through. There are pictures for everyone to enjoy. It's like the younger generations Pinterest but with more memes. 5/5 would recommend.

Not a fan of the new notification system I really do not need to know when every little comment of mine gets more than one point, thank you. It clutters my notification feed and annoys me that I have to clear them out all the time by clicking each one individually. Sometimes there are upwards of thirty notifications. Either add a "mark all as read" option or tone it down with the notifications, guys.

Good...but... Like the app, like the messenger. But I can't access archived messages and my message notification never disappears. Annoying to always think I have one. Did get one message from Imgur mods and I can't delete that one, even though it is weeks old.

Like, the best app. I was asked to write this and I don't know if they'll validate my star rating without a review so here I am. Imgur is great. It's like the best app. I own. On my phone. How are we doing on word count? Enough to make it look like a legitimate review? Probably getting fairly close now. Imgur is great. Be careful of usersub.

Huge improvement-love this app I used to get frustrated on trying to find material that appeals to me since I am not a 25yr old male.  Since they have broken out the content into themes I can immediately go to content that appeals to me.  I definitely recommend this app.

Best download I have ever downloaded in the history of my app downloads. I will spend absurd amounts of time just surfing images. The swipe feature to go to the next image works flawlessly and every image loads without issue. Seriously, gotta love imgur for their dedication.

If You Like An App That Crashes Constantly... Go somewhere else, because this app is filled with great content. The IMGUR team is really making the app something great to have in your phone, and the community (for the new IMGURians) is phenomenal. I'm sure you can find great humor and content here.

Great Time Waster Love this app. A little too much. It's great for avoiding any real responsibilities and homework. I can never get out of bed until I have scrolled through the front page for at least an hour. Don't download this app unless you want to turn into a lazy sack of crap.

Always worth a laugh A friend for me into Imagur when he wasboosting, and couldn't stop laughing. There's some very enjoyable stuff posted on Imagur: some cool, some very funny. There's also the occasional downer, or just horrible post, but the community rating system keeps good content near the top.

Great app, FAST uploads but pics are always out of order I like to upload my images in order so you can understand a process or a setting, but they always seem to get scrambled. I select them in numerical order when uploading but it doesn't seem to make a difference.

Good, but what about Subreditts? I usually use the other app, PocketGur. I got this one when it stopped loading any of the pages. I was trying to get to a subreditt that i like and couldn't find anywhere to type it in and get to it. Good app, closer to the home site but no subs.

This is a title. Imgur is awesome. App could use a little work probably (I get it it takes time but there's been a lot of community outcry for some features) but either way, takes up any moment in my day I would otherwise be bored pretty seamlessly.

Great way to waste time. I love Imgur and have been using it for years it has amazing stories and hilarious pictures and Memes if you want to find some good stuff on the Internet this is a place to look the app organizes it easily to show you the best stuff first.

imgur can be anything The only problem with this app is that you WILL get addicted. imgur has made me laugh, made me cry, motivated me to workout again, and made me rediscover a sense of wonder for this strange world we inhabit. Thank you, imgur. I'll go to bed on time one day, but until then keep em comin... :)

It's good You want memes, they have memes. You want jokes, they have jokes. You want some other third thing, sure why not. Collect images you make in photo shop or just of the internet to communicate. Needs a better search system though.

Gifs are a nightmare Any post with .gifs is nearly impossible to get through if you don't have a great connection. Rather than allowing you to pause the .gif to let if buffer, the app attempts to constantly play it, restarting it and freezing over and over again. It's honestly easier to just open the post in the browser and play the .gif there where you can let it buffer before watching it.

Very satisfied Solid and smooth app (especially when compared to the unofficial apps that I had to rely on previously. This particular app still crashes every now and again--definitely more often than most of the other apps I use. But, overall, I am very happy with the official imgur app!

No one reads this. Does anyone really read this? I don't think so. I'm pretty sure no one will ever read this, but if someone does, and they take a picture, and that picture gets to the front page, and they can get to southern Oregon, I will make them homemade pretzels.
A step backwards The most recent update eliminated some REALLY IMPORTANT THINGS:

Almost there It's a great app to find pictures and gifs but it would be nice to have a way to see the direct link to post on some subreddits. Also, when posting pictures using the app the picture quality goes down tremendously as apposed to uploading it from the website. These changes will make it a 5 star app for sure!

Way better I originally uninstalled this app a while back because it was horrendously designed from a UI perspective.  This iteration is amazing and I love it.  I just wish there was a "copy direct link" button next to the image after it's uploaded.

Best app/Most used If my phone kept a log of which app I used the most, this would be it. I use it to find funny reaction gigs to copy into text messages to girls that may or may not sleep with me. I find dank memes to send my friends. I save the dankest memes for my grandmother. I love imgur. It's a problem.

Happily have lost hours on this app When I open this app, I say to myself "only a minute."  Never happens. I have happily lost hours of my life in this app.  It makes me so happy.  Have seen some incredibly weird and wonderful images and gigs that I see no where else.

Truly an amazing community I'm definitely giving this five stars because of the community and ton of original content. However if you want to not waste one to two hours every day... I highly suggest you do not download this app.
Awesomeness I haven't really had any crashing issues, just some occasional message loading errors.

No option to share to facebook (iphone 6) Excellent app! However, unlike the desktop version, when trying to share an image, it allows the option to use twitter, email, text, etc. but there is no option to share via facebook!

Getting better all the time Each release has been better than the last. Not sure I'm down with double-tapping to upvote, though: that gesture means "go deeper" or "show me more." A long-press would have been better. Still, ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ to you, imgur.

Waste of Time If you want to be at all productive this is not the app for you. As a person who tries to avoid all responsibility this app has made my life easier then it already is. This app helps me avoid unnecessary conversations, defuse awkward situations, and kill my free time. 5/5 stars.
There's a mature filter I see a lot of people commenting about how users submit NSFW posts and a

Awesome Use this app every night in bed. It's become part of my routine at night, can't go to sleep without browsing. Very easy to use, love that I can swipe left or right to see the next/previous post. Never have any issues with this app. üëçüèª

Amazing I have had the app for my phone for a little over a year now. There have been a few changes/updates, all of which have made Imgur more enjoyable and streamlined. Loads fast, never had it quit while using. Love it!

Imgur = THE GREATEST Imgur has the funniest stuff on the interwebz. Then on top of that, the people that comment make the stuff even funnier. So you have to upvote their comments. Because they're so brilliant at times. I love the people of Imgur. They make it the funniest. You will too. Download the app and join the laughs and laugh snorts.

Better than Reddit As an up and coming YouTuber, I need to know what's funny in order to borrow for my own gain. Luckily, this app does just that by making a simplistic interface with an easy means of judging what's hot and what's not. The comment section is even better than Reddit.

Almost perfect Its pretty much the exact same as the desktop version. My only issues is the broken text for the description and title. The description keeps overlapping untop of the last image, and the title gets clipped in half. Other than those two issues, really nice job!
Best Entertainment EVER! The best photos, gifs, and it is MEME heaven!!

Decent interface, but flawed I like the interface overall, but being a lurker I don't know all aspects of it. I do know that not all posts show up, and there is no front page grid view to pick up where I left off.

DATA HOG Much better than older versions. However, this app on my new 6s is now costing me money, as 5gb of data is insufficient for a month, and I've been up charged twice this year by my service provider.

2nd most-used app on my phone I love Imgur! It's a great community whom people can rely on or talk to and have other people help and/or contribute. It's filled with hilarious content and jokes only really understood by imgurians. This is my first year using Imgur but it's really easy to get into and learn. Definitely get Imgur!

What's with the ads all of a sudden?? I will GLADLY pay for an ad-free version of your app. I've been a devoted imgurite/imgurian/imgiraffe for years and years and love what you do for all of us. Please, please, please, if you keep this ad banner on every post, offer a paid version so we can opt out of seeing it. I know you guys worked hard on this iOS app but these ads really detract from the experience and gives the app a very cheap feel.
Love it!! Have gotten such encouragement and great ideas for projects from this site! Way better than Pinterest for the projects for the most part! Highly would recommend for anyone to check out!

Notification page doesn't load Works fine to view images, but the notifications page sits there forever and never loads. What's the point? Is there any QA before the app is released, or do you just throw it on the Store and hope?

It's mildly adequate. Imgur has a decent community- not perfect but pretty good.  Generally some pretty neat posts on here, covering every topic imagineable.  Staff do an incredible job of weeding out inappropriate posts very quickly and interact a lot with the users.  Compared to other similar website/apps, Imgur is pretty good.

A Gem of the Internet Imgur is everything great about the internet. From cute animal photos to rad gifs to a whole community of unique users, it's a great way to kill a few minutes or a couple of hours. I'd call it an essential app for your phone.

Most used app on my phone. Takes all my data and battery but delivers the goods on most days. Gifs can be messy sometimes. The chat function can be weird. Just remember to keep up with the cat tax and you should be okay.

Need Share Direct Link option for IOS all that will make the app perfect is that option because pics posted like that on reddit from imgur don't look nice at all and get an annoying "one album image bot" notification everytime..android users can do this why can't we?

Glad to see it released Well, the UI is very clunky and it seems to me like its just a web app that loads the mobile site instead of an actual standalone app. I think the whole thing needs a complete overhaul. Make the GUI smoother, less "website-y". There is also a big problem with it locking up when swiping posts in the gallery forcing a restart of the app (which the most recent update claimed to fix).

Love it but... I really want to be able to turn my phone and make images full screen. It used to happen but one of the updates took that feature away, it's rather annoying and makes it hard to see images from time to time...
Search function at last! Imgur keeps improving their app and after too many bugs and fixes they seem to finally have their act together.  I love the current incarnation.  Seems a lot faster too.
Way better than the mobile web version! It has its issues at times but overall this app is SO much better than the trying to use the mobile version of the site.

Policy Changes It's unfortunate that staff decided to make policy changes so that the front page is garnished with porn every other image. Very very disappointing. Imgur use to be a fun relaxing way to catch up on news stories, get a good laugh and other relatable content. I understand you can change your settings. The filter doesn't catch everything. Wont likely be browsing as much. Which is sad. Time to find a new community. Boys go to a porn site to see it and keep Imgur old fashion.

Exactly what I want It works perfectly for me. I don't upload anything, really, so I can't speak to that. But viewing, voting, commenting - all extremely easy and functional. Even gifs load just fine; I've never had a problem.

Useless App, Better of not wasting your time This app is completely useless. I use Imgur to upload pictures to Reddit, not to browse Imgur. So many useless functions but not one useful function. You can easily search for users, pictures, and keywords. But trying to figure out how to upload or delete a photo is impossible. Until they stop focusing on useless features and start focusing on useful features I refuse to change my rating.

Imgur is almost as Good as Tacos Imgur is the best thing that has happened in my whole life (please don't tell my girlfriend)... The memes found on imgur cure my crippling depression with their dankness that is out of this world. I would tell everyone right now to download this app. You won't regret it :)

Mostly Great Only issues I have with this app is the navigation of the various boards. It's very easy to back out of a post from a specific board. At which point you have to either search for the post or scroll through said board again.

Great time waster I can scroll around Imgur for hours. Who needs to do things when you can sit on the couch in the safety of your own home and scroll through pictures of things happening to other people?

This is not the app you're looking for This app seems to be a tool Imgur created to only boost their site as a social network instead of focusing on what it is: an image sharing site. I installed it thinking that a site I use to upload pics to would have an upload feature. Imgur, of course, apparently decided that adding upload capabilities to an image sharing site wasn't important. This app is completely useless to me and will be uninstalled.
SARAH PLS Finally, an update to add uploading - and it doesn't even work! I've tried uploading multiple times with this app and it either crashes or the button just doesn't work.

No full screen? So with the old version when you selected a post it would blow up to full screen size. Could you bring that back? Or at least have an option where you can choose that view? The new version has way too much going on.

Can't stand it. The reason I started using this service years ago was it was very simple. All I wanted was an easy way to upload images to share on the net. No more. As soon as I opened the app I was assaulted with so much content I couldn't even make sense of it. Animated gigs that I couldn't make go away causing me motion sickness. No thanks, deleted, will never be back. Thanks for ruining a once great service. Oh, and I might add, it is so broken their feedback link doesn't even work.
Can't upload gifs/videos Good for viewing content but not sharing your own. So mostly, this is a bad app.

Im proud Mainly a mobile user. I actually deleted the app a month ago because I started disliking the community. But out of boredom of course I came back and wow! App has completely changed for the better and extremely user friendly. Good job

Imgur app A hellish distraction and a colossal waste of time. All too often I find myself wasting time just browsing the posts on and on until I realize that my entire day is gone and it's suddenly one AM in the morning like right now... good day.

Love it! Love this app because there's always something funny to stumble across. I like having the pocket imgur to take a 10 min mental break from my day and laugh. The community is also pretty nice and easy to get along with should you choose to interact.

It's the only mobile app left that doesn't have a toxic community. Imgur has its share of idiots, everywhere does. But in general, the community is welcoming, supportive, genuinely funny, and down to earth. Would highly recommend if you want to laugh.

Completely stupid This used to be a great app. Then they forced only what's popular on the home page which takes all choice away from the user. Also got rid of gaming imagur so I now have no reason to use this app.

SERIOUSLY?! I have been browsing imgur for a few years. I browse imgur when i want to relax or relieve stress, not get frustrated with bugs.
