Every few pictures or so, the app will lock up and i can't do anything else but to restart the app. Also, when scrolling, the hitboxes are way off and it thinks i clicked the ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ button.

Gets the job done The app is pretty good at browsing as it only force closes a couple times a day, however, browsing seems to be the limit of its capabilities. I would love to be able to post images straight from my phone as it is where I take most of my photos.

Great site, good app. I love imgur so much. The app itself has gotten progressively better. When I am connected to wifi, the gifs load very well, but on data, the gifs load slowly. (It could be the fact I have an iPhone 4, but whatever) keep rocking, Alan and Sarah! If I had a cat to post i would give you some cat tax.
Not liking the update -Cannot just swipe down to go back to the main list

Only one small problem... NO MESSENGER?! Imgur is amazing but the day they install a messenger function into this app is the day that I spontaneously turn into a fish and live out the days following in the sea seeking treasures and having adventure with my mermaid friends. 5/7 would recommend.

Great app. Always improving. This app runs really smoothly. And they're always taking steps to improve it. The only issue I have is that the links from my browsers often don't open. They'll open the app store and that's it.

Fantastic App! If you love Imgur on desktop, this mobile version is dare I say better. I loved Imgur for about 1.5 years and its helped me through dark times. This app has made every function of Imgur easier and more accessible. Download this app!
Keeps getting more and more addictive Ooh but the ads. And lack of favorites folders.

Greatest time killer ever Been a long time lurker ever since I got addict about 5 years ago. I constantly kill time using this app and take the dank memes and gifs to destroy my friends in battles. Use this to see things on the inter web before all others

Good stuff, and getting better all the time. I spend way too much time using this app not to rate it. Love it. They seem to listen to their people and I've never had issues worth mentioning. Just get it if you don't have it!

Crashy, crash crash Linking thru Notification messages crashes the app. Used to not do that, now it's every single time. Also, my comments to which those Notification messages refer have disappeared. How can that be? Not cool. Nobody at the developer is reading these comments, if so, they don't care.

Crashes my entire phone. I'm on the front page then if I tap an image it won't load then it freezes then it kills my phone. That's a problem. Please fix that. That could really mess up someone's spring board.

UPVOTE AND FAVORITE Why would you put them at the top? Everyone has phablet phones which makes that incredibly in convenient to go to. When this update was in beta testing that was the # 1 complaint. Why did you choose to ignore that?

I have never written a review for an app Until now. Imgur is like an old friend. There are memes of memes, parodies, comedy, laughs, useful info, useless knowledge, amazing stories, tears, well known Imgurians like Bill nye. Imgur is comfort, home - more than just an app. It's a community and my relationship with this app has grown. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

It helps me laugh When you need a break from social media, or your family is driving you insane, Imgur will bring you happiness and plenty of laughs. It has also helped me not have to deal with this maddening election cycle in the US.
It's good! Hey, it's a good app,

Phone Apps 101 I WAS very pleased with the Imgur app until the latest update... Adds on every post taking away from the experience 100% can't express how disappointing it is to see them. Shameful to see Imgur take this direction in its latest update, hopefully most of the recent reviews being written will be a sign to turn back time and revert to their previous ways. Could be a serious problem for me browsing imgur using my mobile phone.

5 bananas I give this app on a scale of banana to banana, 5 bananas. All the improvements that have been made and even before those the app has been great for treasuring those moments that my toilet and I share together.

Awesome This app makes me so happy even when I am sad I can give you the best of laughs even when you don't feel like laughing I recommend this to anybody who just feels like looking at amazing stuff that people have created.

Great Service Best image hosting site around. Easy to browse interface, no malignant as pop-ups, and (mostly) crystal clear images. I guarantee most of the low ranking reviews are from Reddit manchildren who ran out of things to complain about.

Good app App works well after latest update; however, if you download gifs and intend to send them by message it will send as a photo. Certain images save as videos instead of gifs and those have no trouble being played once saved and sent.
Excellent! Very well designed app. Makes solid use of gesture controls and animation to give it a modern feel. Looks great on the larger screen phones too üëç

Great for what it is So the app works in theory- if you want to upload photos, I suggest using the desktop version however. But for the casual lurker it's the bees knees. As with most apps- it helps if you've actually got an account. Sometimes the notification function can be a little fritzy but I digress...

My Favorite App. Although I'm giving it 5 stars. I do wish there was a cache limit. I always find myself over 300mb and wish there were a way to set a limit where it clears out when it reaches that limit

Amazing app This app is best I've ever been to and easiest to use. Great for surfing for pictures wether it was funny,gaming,etc. Really would recommend to download and an amazing community in there. Which even got posts daily to read and look at.

Perfect for a laugh or unexpected ugly cry I use this app to occasional check out funny pictures to pass time or get a laugh. Every so often you come across an emotional story or intensely moving post. Nothing like bursting out in tears in public places or on the toilet! I Love Imgur
Runs smooth Loads very quick from page to page, never had it crash. Runs better than mobile website.

Great app, excellent improvements lately It's had its ups and downs, but I think they've finally gotten it working smoothly with all the improvements that have been requested in place. Smooth to use, not clunky at all.
Absolutely Fabulous Everything you'd expect from the website on the mobile. Heck, it's even better with a great navigation setup and easy pivoting ability. 5/7 would use again.

The greatest waste of time app you could wish for!!! Love to spend hours on here, great for keeping up with current events, what's trending on the internet and the cutest dogs and cats you will ever see. Funny, sad, scary it's all here. Download now you will not regret it!!!

Gotta love imgur but... This app can use some serious improvement. I'm browsing imgur way more now b/c of the app, so the basics are built in and easy to use, it just needs some refinement. Uploading pics is unreliable, browsing user sub is delayed and produces duplicate images, and checking comments can get outta wack. I love the swipe left and right, and upvote/downvote works well enough. Thanks.

Glitchy This app, while good intentioned, leaves much to be desired. It all starts off well and good, for the most part, but when you finally relax and gain viewing momentum, the software bugs and you are left unable to switch images or go to the gallery. This app is slow to react and often freezes in the form of blinking images or 'hourglass' syndrome where the waiting logo never leaves the screen.

Good app App works well after latest update; however, if you download gifs and intend to send them by message it will send as a photo. Certain images save as videos instead of gifs and those have no trouble being played once saved and sent.

Haven't been able to use since the ads I understand why Imgur needs ads, but I haven't opened the app since ads were introduced. They're too distracting on my phone screen. It's sad because I've always loved browsing on my phone; it was my go-to time wasting app because it never felt wasted. But I can't support an app that doesn't allow me to purchase to opt out of ads. They are too hard to look past and I can't get over it.

Amazing app experience You have created an app that works seamlessly on any mobile platform. Extremely reliable and works every time!!! I thank you for the time and effort your team put into making this app awesome.

Time killer in the best of ways! Love this app! I've spent probably days on this app and there is always new stuff. I love other apps such as Reddit and iFunny, but it takes so long for new material. This app seems to have new stuff every time I open it!

Hilarious I sometimes pee myself when I'm looking at this app. Granted I am on the toilet taking a dump but it still counts. 6/5 stars I love this stuff. Thanks for letting me be the friend that has all the funny pictures. I now have a place in this world thanks to this app

It's Aiight Dawg What can I say? I'm a mother of two female munchkins whom I adore probably an unhealthy amount but who also make me want  bang my head against a wall sometimes. So to keep from permanent brain damage, I go on imgur several times a day, and apply laughs where needed. It's a balm for the soul.
How can you not love Imgur? Great time waster, cool trivia info you never knew you needed to know, and funny pictures at your fingertips.

Some bugs, but really user-friendly Love the app, use it all the time. Sometimes there's an error where comments get posted like 6 times instead of once, but it's intermittent. Great user interface tho.

Generally good With iOS9, mine won't load gifs fully. It only goes for a second or two then stops. This happens with every gif and doesn't help to try to reload, come back, close and reopen app, etc. I didn't have this problem until iOS 9, so I'm guessing it's directly related.
The truth If you're downloading this app, it's because you desperately need to get your fix, but (1) you don't have a computer near you and (2) safari just isn't cutting it anymore.

Amazing app This app is amazing. I spend so much time on here and aside from the excellent content the posts the community contributes to makes it an even better experience. Good comedy at times and supportive and understanding where needed! Love this app and its community of users .

Dickbutt This is about the fifth time the app has asked me to write a review so I finally decided to go ahead and write one. Great app if you like to browse Imgur. Not too familiar with how to post but I'm sure it's simple. Only downside is that there isn't any messaging on the app.

Can we get messaging please Overall experience is pretty good. I would really like to be able to see and reply to messages in the app though. I miss out on this aspect of the community and others probably think I'm rude because I don't respond to messages in a timely fashion.

Good, but could be better Everything seems pretty decent except for the new look. Not that it's bad, but the older design seemed sleeker and newer, while this new look lacks sharpness. The rest of the interface works very well.
This version is functional. Finally! Used several past versions of this app. This version finally seems to "just work" without being glitchy.

Perfect and well developed app Imgur is one of my favorite sites! I am glad the app is well developed included intuitive app that's well integrated.  It is simplistic and straight forward to use.  I would rather use this now than the desktop edition.

Been using Pocketgur Until recently, I had been using Pocketgur to access Imgur content without a Web browser. The only downside was that Pocketgur would refuse to keep me logged in. So I don't have to worry about that anymore.
Total amazing addictive waste of time This app has completely destroyed any hope of intimacy with my wife. Since showing this app to her, we haven't talked to each other at night in over a month.
Message Badge won't go away / Uploader is Derpy I have no messages read or unread, and there is still a glaring red message badge on the app icon.

I had high hopes, but was let down. Unfortunately, this app isn't better than the unofficial app. It regularly crashes (and loses your place), it struggles to load gifs (and sometimes just won't load them at all), it doesn't offer the option to search images, upload images, or navigate to a specific sub-reddit. Lots of little things to fix. Until then, I'm going back to the unofficial app. Sorry, Sarah. I gave it an honest chance.

Unexpectedly Great! I downloaded it thinking is was just something people used to upload pictures for themselves, but it's actually a sharing thing and I find tons of funny posts every day! Love the app

Needs favorite folders Like everyone else has said, it's a fine app except it needs favorite folders, and some filters. There are some triggering and upsetting things that could be filtered, above and beyond mere nudity or language.
So smooth I used to just browse on my phone with my internet browser, but this is so much smoother! Things load better, the messaging works well, and the controls are intuitive. +1
Few buggs Has a few problems with loading or starting gifs, but a quick refresh by swiping back and forth gets it started!
well i mean... if you have never been to the website that's a mistake if you don't have this app GET IT or just toss your phone into the closest body of moving water because why do you have a phone?

Good app that needs to lighten up on "in page adds" Love this app, and sponsors buying a page every few posts wouldn't bother me. But when you have advertisements on every posts it's not to my liking as much. That being said, I really do love this app and the Imgur community.

I had this app going on 4 years! Recently ruined! This app has recently changed and I no longer appreciate it. You might like it if posting selfies, and stories that should be Facebook entertain you. It's become a disgusting mix of instagram and Facebook.

Delete comments? New to imgur. Use it mostly for photo comments and stuff for Reddit. The problem is that there is a lack of mods or anything to filter out the trolls that leave offensive comments on your pics. The worst is that when trolls leave a rude and offensive comment, it gets upvotes. I'd like the option to delete those comments.

Great App I asked a month or so ago this, "One thing I would like is the ability to have the statusbar." And you fixed it, and all the other problems I had with the previous app versions also, I rate 5 stars.

Keeps crashing This app has a problem coping with images that are not taken by the stock camera app.  I use ProCamera and when I try to upload images via the Imgur app, it will crash if when scrolling through my photo library I come across images taken in ProCamera (I use the TIFF format).  I suspect Imgur chokes because it doesn't know how to process a TIFF.  I've tried reinstalling but it still fails.  Guess it's back to using the website for now...
3.0 best update so far I think you guys finally reshaped this app to a more friendly user experience, overall is more smooth and practical then the versions before. I hope you keep it this way!

Does exactly what I want it to do This app is great for sitting down and chilling with posts to satisfy any person from cute animals, sob stories, work stories, DIY posts, funny GIFS, and the latest news that the major channels won't cover Imgur has it all.

she does what she does instagram is getting out of touch with its consumers, too often it is non original content applauded through reposts and aggregate hobby accounts. Imgur offers that, and a surprising amount of artistic integrity, original content.

Best App Ever! I easily use this app everyday. I use it for the dank memes, daily news, and all the great specialty categories they make. Overall I recommend this app to anyone. The vast people of Reddit will back me up and say that this is a mandatory app to have on your phone!

This app is trash Got the app so I could save gif's easily from Reddit links on my phone (since Alien Blue's save feature doesn't work of GIF's) and every time I try to open the app from safari or alien blue (from a link I want to save) rather than loading the post from the source, it decides to launch the App Store page, and when I tap Open it just starts a new instance of the app, rather than loading the requested page.
Fun! I'm just a big fan but I love the way you can see the other way around your face when you see the same thing as you do not see you the way they do it so hard I just wanna say thank me for th

Organize search tags by points Please restore the search tags organized by points. When you did a search in previous versions it would sort descending by highest points, now search results are random.

Obnoxiously opens app every time I click an Imgur link in browser Hate this "feature" incredibly intrusive and no way to opt out. Every time you click an Imgur link on a site like Reddit, instead of opening a browser tab, the app loads and you can't navigate back to the original page without closing Imgur and going back to your browser. There also doesn't seem to be an option for disabling this nonsense.

It's good but.. It runs good and all but there are some issues I have downloading images for one.  It gives you the option to only download all images and not just a specific one. Also it doesn't even download the images to my phone.

Awesome app it runs really smooth. There's a few downers in comparison to the website but that's obvious. This is as good as I could think it would get in comparison to other apps. You will always have the latest memes and funny posts at your disposal B)
Love the content, app needs tweaking Totally love the content, makes me laugh out loud every time I open it.
Great app and great community Pro: awesome way to pass time.

Took your survey... I was taking the Imgur survey, and during the question "What can we do to make you more likely to recommend the Imgur app to a friend or colleague?" I wrote in my answer of "Less force quits" and when I hit next to continue the survey, the app force quit... Can't say I didn't try!
Highly recommend Love this app seeing all the funny stuff people post and bs sob stories... And now finally we have messaging which is a big step forward now about those favorite folders...

Better than 9GAG (although that's not hard to do.) Mostly funny stuff on the viral page. Sometimes it can get an overflow of people's crappy political or cultural options but for the most part way better than 9GAG if you're looking for an alternative.

No issues really. It runs pretty smoothly on my iPhone. No real problems as far as operations and general smoothness. It can crash on occasion but I've only experienced that a handful of times. Overall I'd rate the app a solid 5/7

Chat I love opening up imgur, my issue with it is that as of recently I can't seem to use imgur chat. It will say pending once I send something or that the user isn't available, and when they send something to me it shows as sent, except I never receive the messages.  I hope y'all resolve the issue soon.

Recent update is hard to use The green bothers me tbh but I'll get used to it. However, I'm usually a one-handed mobile user, and double tapping to zoom in on pics was the greatest thing since sliced bread! But it was taken from us. And making the .gifs play manually may seem like a good idea, but that makes it that much more infuriating when they don't properly load. This update has actually made imgur very difficult to use.

Meh. I expected better. I was excited to see this app but it was a letdown. When it loads it takes forever and most of the time randomly decides to load in the middle of browsing, which again takes forever. I enjoyed it for the hour I had it installed, hope to see some issues fixed.

Still some glitches to work out Great new layout but whenever I click on a link to another post and click on a picture or link from that post it just scrolls to the top. Also, this update seems to crash more.
Much better Finally! For once I don't have any complaints! The issue with comments saying they've been deleted was fixed in the last update and I am satisfied at last!

App issues I uploaded this app last week and it was working great at first. Over the past few days, there have a been a few times where the images and comments won't open. From what I saw, it is a great app. Not sure if it's just me having this issue or if other people are as well but I hope the get this fixed. The comments and images are classics.
Getting better The app has improved dramatically over the last few months.  Still not as good as desktop but getting there.
Hours will be wasted scrolling through The app works as well as the website. The good side being, it is less distracting as it isn't another tab on my work computer.

Gifs in jifs Sure I could have cured cancer or invented a new kind of hyper efficient photovoltaic but instead I've spent the last 2 years watching cats fall and babies walk around with a certain smugness with the words "THUG LIFE" super imposed over them. Life well wasted.
Amazing app It's a great app easy to use and a great layout I think it's better than the actual website the only problem is you might not be able to put it down

In honor of Imgur birthday and mine I guess I love imgur, I started using it because I hated clicking on all those links from reddit( what the heck is all that?) I've had my imgur for like three years and I use it everyday so that's kind of a powerful testimony.

Please fix! I love imgur but the newest update really messed with user experience. If you want to play a gif you now have to press the button to play it each time. In the past they would automatically play. Super annoying...please fix!

One of my favorites Big Imgur fan and have found their native app to be much more robust and user friendly than the third party Imgur apps I've tried. Could us access to more boards by default though.

Slick app, interface, and always leads to... Something This app is stylish and clean. I really appreciate the with that went into this making it pretty and functional. Works great, never had problems, and I enjoy the content!

Best image sharing app I use The images are funny and personal and I like that but what makes imgur great is its community. So many people on imgur are nice and caring and so few are rude and the ones that are are quickly down votes out of existence.

Great interface for the imgur web site I love the reliability of the new version - animated gifs seem to load well, regular images are zoom-able, and it stopped asking for my password all the time! Good job!

Love it I love imgur, and when they finall made an app for it, I had to get it. It's clean, neat, modern, yet still having that imgur desktop feel. I love it so much, and I'm always checking it when I can. I recommend this for anyone, imgurian or not. 11/10

Best thing ever 5/7 As a long time Imgurian i am constantly in the need for a funny, especially when on the go, having the ability to look at my favorite giraffe themed site whilst on the toilet makes me positively giddy.

Great time waster. This app is unlike most social media. There is no pressure to be pretty or seem like you have a better life. The purpose of this app is to make people laugh. I don't like the new adds but it's still a great app over all.

Studies show that imgur grows your brain Imgur is beyond hilarious, it's an escape from the droll social media that we often turn to distract ourselves. Next time you need a break, make it a productive one by checking out a gif or meme that is guaranteed to make you smile :)
Rating is for app and store I absolutely love Touch of Modern! The company itself has the coolest stuff and some really great deals.

Sigh.. The more this app is update the worse it gets. From unwanted advertisements to CONSTANT crashes. The developers can't leave well enough alone. What once was a nearly perfect app is now a nest of frustration and lack of amusement.

User albums? Most the time I use imgur for albums but I cannot seem to find how to easily access them. Am I missing something obvious or will it be coming in the future? Until then I think I'll stick with using chrome or safari instead

Perfect tool for lazy people I'm too lazy to get up from my couch and go all the way up to my computer and search imgur. But now I don't have to get up! I just simply pull out my phone and open the app and I'm overloaded with dickbutts...

Love this site !! This is the site u want to be on when ur at the DMV or waiting in line at target while the lady in front of you is return 14 items or just in the bathroom ..  just the easiest way make a horribly boring situation better !
Just do it. I can honestly say the contents of this app have made me laugh, cry, and learn some irrelevant things. It's just a great way to burn some time, no doubt about that.
Imgur has become a daily part of my day! I've always enjoyed captioning photos--which is now called "making memes."
Never gets old I sacrifice gigabytes of data for this app every month just because it's so entertaining. Who New looking at pictures and reading long blocks of texts could be so thrilling.

Imgur Imgur is a mix of heartwarming stories, quick funny comics, and is one of my favorite apps to browse while I'm not doing anything. I can honestly recommend this to anyone and I think you'll have a great time there.

Run by snowflakes and caters to fruitcakes. Save yourself the frustration. The imgur community applauds stupidity and spits at anything logical. Inflammatory and volatile content gets popular votes to the front page but when a post that presents a different view (a conservative one) it gets taken down by Imgur Moderators. Gg San Fransisco Flakies.

Amazing! I love the functionalities of this app. It's much better than ifunny, as for the community is what bases the featured posts. It's very easy to use and VERY easy to get addicted. Sometimes I close the app just to reopen it seconds later lol.
Imgur rocks This is a well made app, they constantly fix bugs appropriately. This is probably my favorite viewing style for Imgur, plus it's easier to post if you have stuff on your phone.

Needs a lot of work. This app is riddled with bugs and crashes constantly. It freezes up every single time I use the app and navigating it is a bit of a pain. I hope they are working on fixing the crashing if nothing else.

Better with an update There's no spot to upload your own images. Though I guess it's coming. Glad they added the ability to save images. Just don't like that they had to take 7 steps back for us to get excited about features that were available before.

So far so good. I used to browse user sub using safari. Terrible idea all the disgusting weirdness of usersub was very hard to navigate through. This app is better.  Don't forget to download my mix tape.

New update I love Imgur, and I exclusively use the app to browse. I really like the new update, except that I can't view anyone's (including my own) profile without it crashing immediately. If that can be fixed, then all will be right with the world once again.
Strive to improve every time This app has been improving from the start. It started off shaky, but they seem to really care about listening to users and fixing issues.
Great app This app is better than all other imgur apps easy to login easy to comment easy to view account. Everything loads fast. Imgur is a lot of fun to look at and better than Facebook

Not able to see my profile All of a sudden I was not able to view my favorites or any of my notification post? Kind of weird. Hopefully it will correct itself soon. Tried to log out and log back in. I also tried reinstalling app and that didn't work either.

Pretty decent I probably use this app more than anything. Thank you imgur for being my companion to distract from working or doing homework. I would also like to add that this app has kept me company during my bathroom breaks.
Awesome place to be when you have nowhere else to go. I've literally spent hours here and loved every second.

Top Notch App Development Not a complaint to be seen. App functions beautifully, with a similarly seamless user experience. Work such as this makes me long to become an app developer so I might produce the same tier of product. Excellent work, folks.

Nice app Love the app, hate the procedurally loaded images. You made the same mistake on your mobile website. I hate having to scroll though the images, get to a bunch of unloaded ones, and wait for them to load! I downloaded this app in hopes that the images wouldn't procedurally load. I was wrong, unfortunately.

Freezes when you swipe to next pic LOVEEE Imgur but this app is ehhh...it works good (sometimes). It gets stuck when you swipe to go to the next picture and then you have to completely close out the app and reopen it. I hope they fix this problem because it is extremely annoying!

Great app for people addicted to memes, gifs , stories, and more I love this app it keeps me so occupied. The people are friendly and funny. The only issue I have with the app versus the website is that the app doesn't allow messaging.

Nothing better than IMGUR I don't hardly ever write reviews, but I'm trying to start writing more often. Especially for apps that are my top favorites. Imgur is without a doubt the best place for pictures & Gifs.

author_name: This stupid name thing is crap
review_body: Good app, but some problems. Perfectly usable in its current state. The spam robots can be irritating, but it seems like the dev team is on it. Nice community, but there are a fair amount of unspoken rules that might confuse. Overall, I'd recommend it.

Great website and a good app The app definitely makes it easier for mobile users on Imgur. It does need to have a few things fixed. It is unclear how to edit/ change some settings regarding your account or posts.
A surprisingly deep and meaningful community, and dank memes It's hard to describe but people really open up in beautiful, fun, silly and sometimes painful ways here, and help each other out.

Most popular/newest I love imgur! My only problem is that with my current version every time I close and open the app it starts on most viral popular and not most viral newest which is what I like to browse the most. Hopefully it is fixed soon!

Deleted the app today First this app was ruined with updates, now I'm getting errors saying I've exceeded my post limit and cannot FAVORITE anything. This was on the first thing I favorited that day. I'm not even trying to post anything! I tried to submit an error report, but the app says I have to have an email account configured with the default email program on iPhone in order to do that.

Comes with spammy background noise, can't use at work I work in a silent office environment (a studio) and having Imgur open on my phone for some reason (because of the advertisers I think, or a bug?) emits either a high pitched tone sometimes when my phone is inactive in my pocket or plays weird audio when the app is open. Super frustrating. Can't use it at work.

Where's the imgur rehab center? This app is great but be cautious because it is extremely addictive. If you press the download button be aware that you are saying goodbye to sleep, goodbye to work, and goodbye to any and every social activity, you belong to imgur now.
Excellent! Imgur's app is a wonderful way to view the site's content and to interact with its community.

Keeps logging me out. A great way to pass the time. Otherwise it's a 5 star review. It might be a bug that could be addressed on the next update but it's a hassle logging back in each time. Never had this issue with the previous versions.

Imgur <3 I love imgur and think this is a great interface for viewing content that I look forward to and find amusing. I wish the mobile app was better suited for sending messages between users as the website is, but other than that, I love the app!

It's great, now let me get back to using it! The app is awesome. It's almost as good as using the webpage, naturally.  I'm only writing this review because it keeps asking me to rate the app and then leave a review. As far as I'm concerned this is pretty much it's only flaw.
Won't start up after updating. I hit the update button 2 days ago & haven't bee able to get into the app since. I really like it though. Guess I'll delete it & try reinstalling it.
Love it. That is all. Every application for any system will always need updates to keep up with the times. I have no complaints, now there is a Corgi Butts section added several days ago! Woohoo!!!
I love imgur, so should you ! The app is great, fast, optimal an optimized.

Really gud memes Honestly before I found imgur I thought I had seen some gud memes but I was wrong imgur has changed the way I see memes I have discovered new and awesome memes and would encourage anyone seeking a vast knowledge of memes and their history to download this app.
Amazing Everyone keeps complaining about the ads when they don't even take up that much space on the screen. 99% of the time I don't even notice that they exist.

Solid app for one of my favorite websites Has great tools for an app. Only things that could make it better would be auto updating of the feed and clean up where pressing back takes you (seems to jump around pages).

There is no upload feature in this champaign room It seems like including the ability to upload photos is a rather fundamental part of most social media apps these days.  Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram etc.  So one would expect that the mobile app a platform whose primary function is photo-sharing the ability to upload photos from your mobile platform.  One would be entirely wrong.
Greatest app I would so love it more if you brought be the "download all images" option viewing 30+ pics can be tiring when you want to save them all one by one
Better than the other social media apps So much more user-friendly and less spammy than the app you know I'm thinking about. Now I ask you. How many bananas will you choose?

Problems with user interface The app is mostly unchanged from the last version. I find it moves slower. And the interface makes the image block the titles. And forces the description to overlay the image on posts.

Too soon for a title. I used to be depressed, have anxiety and a horrible self image. Thankfully, I discovered Imgur which has greatly compounded all those issues, but within the community they are perfectly acceptable with cat tax.

Notification everyday, no idea what for though Everyday there is a notification badge on the app icon, go into the app, no idea what the notification is for. Go into app settings and turn off all notification, still get some unknown notification everyday.  I was finally forced to disable notification for the app in the System Settings.

Ah, yes. Used to get my meme dumps on Facebook but they were few and far between. Now I can waste time for hours without having to open Facebook in hopes someone posted new content I haven't yet seen.

I'm on it every for hours a day.. It's a great app, what can I say? The images never end and the people just make better stuff. Want a great way to kill time? (Your data plan as well) Imgur is the way to go!
A handy little mobile app With recent upgrades that prevent the Imgur app from randomly crashing and an easy-to-navigate interface, this app is perfect for image hosting or browsing on the go.
Imgur should separate from reddit. The reason why I give this app a 3 star and not a 5 is because I think imgur would be better if it were separated from reddit. Mainly because:
Update the app You guys need to make the app a bit better as I tend to crash often. Regardless I still love the community and I think by now you have my soul anyways,so I'll still leave 5 stars.

Always entertaining I won't admit how often I open this app. I also won't admit how much time I spend on the app each time that I open it. Let's just say that whenever I'm on my phone, the imgur app is open.
Love Imgur! First, Imgur is amazing & an absolute necessity in your life.

Amazing app It's an app for when you want to be a fly in the wall or share a story and gather a crowd.  It's a community and a place where people are welcome.  I hope we continue to improve the reputation of "internet people" as positive people who spread good.
Nothing bad so far... I got this app recently mostly for being able to get image links for apps that only allow posting links. Now it's becoming a regular returning app, on it everyday

Best way to waste all my time. Goodbye free time, hello Imgur! Another app to kill time browsing the Internet...only you get to see the stuff your friends will post on Facebook in two weeks. Easy to use app, very well done.

Crashes. Otherwise good. The crashing when selecting more than 15-20 photos is annoying. A workaround is to immediately hit Next and not stay on the selection page even a second longer than you have to. But it needs to be fixed.

It's a fitting app for Imgur! Sure, there are plenty of ways Imgur can make its app better. But I'm not that hard to please. I like how it's responsive to notifications and it can kill a few hours I have in the day.

Imgur!!! I don't know why you're begging me to rate now.. but since you are, I love you. Anyone who needs to have access to Imgur already does.. and if they don't.. their best friend does so it's all gravy.. you don't have to beg for my love. It's all yours.
Finally! This app works just as it should, and it's almost easier to use than the desktop website. Hopefully there won't be any bugs!

Love the app I love this app but I think there are some issues that need to be worked out. Every time there are a lot of pictures in a post I try to go to the next set and it just starts back over. The side swipe button is too sensitive. And the save button has disappeared. Please fix these issues.
Here because the App asked SO POLITELY Seriously. An in-app star rating followed by a non-pushy request to switch to the App Store? Class act.

Bug, Crashes Well it seems the App Store doesn't have a bug report option anymore. Overall the app has performed well, until this recent update. My iPhone 6 Plus crashes upon launch. Made to clear all other apps from the background as well. Yet to see if a reboot fixes it, but still, wanted to let the Developers know.

Simply Amazing. Although there was/is a few bugs in this application, I can definitely say that I adore imgur. To users who can't save GiFs or for users who simply want to see shenanigans occur, this app is quite frankly the best.
New chat feature There should be a report system that allows Users to report when they get hit with a message from a spam account looking for your information.

The greatest community in the world There are literally dozens of us! Everyone loves it here, except for Edward Macaroni Forks, but that's just a sad sad story. This app deserves a perfect 5/7 bananas for scale, and you should download it to become one of us, one of us, one of us...
Sensible and funny Enjoy the effort put into the content by the Imgur community. Educational informative and the comments are to die for. Better than scrolling through crap on other sites or apps.
Really entertaining with minor issues It freezes up a lot for no good reason, and it always takes forever for gifs to load, no matter what kind of Internet connection I have. Otherwise super great.
Always entertaining There is more to the app than it first appears. Something new every second and a larger social group than you might think

Not bad, still needs work. I'm sure that this is still being tweaked as I write this, but the app needs some help. The loading sign pops up often that it is frustrating to use. I'm looking forward to the finished product.

Buggy It's nice to browse, when it works. It freezes up, crashes, and randomly starts repeating posts as I scroll through. Sometimes it's bad enough that I have to reboot my iPad entirely.

So many bugs While browsing, page sometimes refreshes over and over again and cannot be stopped until you reset the app. App freezes while turning to next page. Comments don't load, and the app itself crashes over and over again. If you're lucky, the app will work for at least ten minutes before glitching up all over again. So frustrating.

Awesome It's a great time waster. When you can go to sleep at night just browse through the app. Most of the images are sweet and make you go awww or laugh. Both of them are lovely at 3 am while your husband is asleep.

You really don't want to work anyway The app for sitting at your desk acting like you're doing something when really you're just watching another gifv of people failing miserably or kittens being adorable

Have you ever had to take a dump? I know I have! Have you ever pondered to yourself, "What should I do when I take a dump?" Well look no further than the IMGUR MOBILE APP!!! Here you can spend all your time dumping being thoroughly entertained with the IMGUR MOBILE APP!!!

Good app, phone hasn't caught fire... Thanks to all the dank memes. For real, life is basically a repost after this, use the app at your own risk. Best app ever And I've only said that two or three times before!!
Best app to use when bored This app will never leave you with nothing to do. Pictures from whatever, and you can look at them for hours on end. Great time waster.

Works great for me I always update iOS and never had any crashing problems... Maybe I'm lucking out. UI is much better now than before. I only view, upvote, and comment and it all works great for me.

This app used to be an awesome way to spend time, now is just spam on every post.

One of us. One of us. One of us. I thought I was just getting a DANK meme app. With your typical comment section being more funny than the post itself. But, soon I realized I joined a family, a community, a memeunity if you will.

Seems promising I appreciate the work you guys have gone through in creating this app. My only gripe is that when logged into your account you're not able to see the images saved as you would on your desktop. Hope that can get fixed.

Down the rabbit hole I go Excellent site to share gifs and photos. Great community of users. I open the app and know that I'm basically going to be unavailable for the next however long.

Community Imgur gives even those who don't post regularly a sense of being a small part of a large community filled with goofy inside jokes, and of course, dank memes.
Improves with every update I'm almost exclusively on the app instead of the computer. They've now added chat. I can't wait till they add favorites folders.

My favorite app I use this app every day. That might have something to do with my serious addiction go Imgur, and this app sure helps feed it! Get this app and sink into the world of Imgur easier than ever.
Great app You can usually see which most viral posts end up on the featured page of iFunny, so you get the funny before it hits iFunny. If that makes any sense
One of my favorites! This app always keeps me laughing! It's one of my used apps! I love it! I've also never had any problems using it, it always works great for me! Definite 5 out of 5 stars!

Perfect 5/7 I spend the most time on the imgur app so any little glitches are perfectly acceptable in the ratio of glitch/time spent on app. Idk, if you're downloading the app you know what to expect.

Still imgur Imgur has long been a great website, and their app isn't really denoting in any way. There are some small issues here and there but the app is really still in its infancy. I have faith that it will be perfect. (Granted I can't complain now)

Just selfies thrist Literally I opened it up and checked the front pages and there were nothing but selfies and Christmas family pictures and people complaining that they are alone or that women are mean too. So download this app if u want to look at google searches selfies and people making up stories or complaining that they don't have anyone to date cause they complain to much
I had to uninstall Because it's way too addicting. Haha. "I'll spend 10 minutes browsing" *an hour later* "10 more minutes"

Update is trash I love Imgur, but the update has ruined it. The upvote system is now painful, the downvote button and favorite are an inconvenience. Zooming is also more difficult since double tapping is now upvoting. Every time I leave the app, it refreshes to the top of the content, not letting me continue where I left off. If I can't delete the update, just make the thing bearable before I abandon the app and site entirely.
Like button After recent update the like button was moved to the top. It absolutely needs to be moved back to the bottom. Who wants to reach to the top of the screen for every post they like.
Is best Sure, sometimes the servers have a little trouble, but most of the time that doesn't stop you from enjoying all the wonderful content.
Great except minor bug Awesome app. Only bug I found is that the advertisement at the bottom blocks you to see the bottom of the screen. Can't scroll down to see bottom comments for example.

Great start This is a pretty good app and compared to pocketgur it's more easy to navigate. The one thing that is missing that pocketgur DOES have is the easy "save picture" option. I like to save all the good posts and send them to my sister so she thinks hilarious :)

Could be great Everything about this app would make me give it five starts except the fact that watching gifs is almost impossible. It continues to load the gif and after trying so many times the whole app just crashes. 2 stars because it's literally impossible to use half the time.
I may be drunk but.... Even when I'm not, this is my favorite way to pass time, avoid homework, and, most importantly, get a laugh! I've never had an issue with the app. Get it. -Mollyj2

Entertaining, but often stupid I learn and laugh a lot due to this app, but there is a surprisingly large amount of idiocy which I can't understand how anyone would view it as quality of value in any field.

Disappointing ad update- SHAME SHAME SHAME Imgur now has ads on every. Single. Post. They're between the image and the top comments. So disappointing and irritating. I'm deleting the app, the ads take away from each post, they're that distracting. They're also huge in comparison to what you see on the app. This is on top of their "sponsored" posts that pop up at least every 5-10 posts.
Tolerable. The content is still good but the ads right below EVERY post is a drag. Maybe an ad page after every 15-20 or posts would be more tolerable.

What an amazing app!! Truly a great boredom killer and a great way to find things you like and some people to talk to them with! The Imgur chat is a great thing to have now and a wonderful simple thing to use!!!!
A truly awesome app I am very satisfied with the mobile version of Imgur! I thing the team is definitely listing to comments and acting upon them to improve the app exponentially.

Ads I understand a free app needs to use advertisements to earn some revenue, but the ads are forced down your throat without even tapping on them. Either it's a bug or they programmed the ads to open when you want to go down to the comments. Either way it is the only reason I have decided to uninstall and never use the app again, 4/5 otherwise.
Great start for a great app! Love it so far, glad the official app is back out. There may be a few minor bugs to discover as I use it more, but for now this is the only app I use to browse Imgur.

Had so much potential I had such high hopes for this app when it was announced. Unfortunately, it seemed blatantly obvious that this was done by amateurs. As an Imgur user/fan and someone who works in the mobile app industry, I would have to say that this is one of the poorer apps that have come out of San Francisco. Do some more user tests, and increase your development budget. 2 stars.
Crashes The app keeps having problems staying active. When I open it, it crashes and takes me back to the home screen. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but it still keeps doing it.

Uploading is an issue I love the UI and the app is nicely done for mobile, the only problem I have is I get an error creating album when I try to upload more than one picture (which I do alot). I also cannot look as dm's in the app, not that I get enough anyways.
Bathroom breaks take so much longer now. It is addictive and this one has a great design. Once you spend a few hours you will become one of us.
Imgur is awesome! Would give 5 stars if you could message in the app. Doesn't make sense why you can't. Otherwise, some "over-capacity" issues sometimes but great.
Awesome Great app; rarely ever freezes. Just wish posters would stop copying others and posting the same thing weeks later. Down vote is a terrific button.
Awesome! Imgur is my go to app every evening for hours. Not that long ago, it was terrible. They have improved usability, performance and really improved the overall experience.  Thanks!!

Imgurrrr Very clean layout and intuitive. They actually make worthwhile changes and so far, they've resisted the temptation to make changes for the sake of pushing "updates". Looking at you, Facebook....

Just a review. Praise Helix What kind of review were you expecting. Sure a lot of reviews aren't the best in the world, but people don't give great reviews for meth either. It's basically the same. It's addicting and filled with dark stuff, yet you find yourself coming back. 5/7 would recommend.

It has potential. It looks great and has all the standard features. But it's nowhere near perfect. It often gets caught up when I try to sign in and goes to black screen. Takes forever to load images and I hate that you have to play GIFs manually.

Needs work Definitely beats using the web version on mobile, but tends to break on "load more photos" and have a few other issues in general. I'd rather the interface match the website more closely but be optimized for the touchscreen. Would be great to have ability to save photos, as well.
Awesome App I was a bit skeptical about this app as it had no reviews but after a couple hours of use. It's a great app, definitely worth the download if you enjoy browsing imgur.
Not crashing! Finally. After 3 weeks of crashing constantly this new update works a lot better. Still glitches randomly but getting there!

Really terrible This is easily the most glitchy and unreliable app I have period. It never works for more than a few images before freezing and it always locks up when I try to move from a gif to the next image.

Wonderful way to loose time Sometimes you just have to scroll mindlessly until you finally find the hidden gold stash in the usersub
I like the app better than the desktop site. This app is absolutely amazing. Great community, humorous posts, and inside jokes like no other. Definitely worth a download.

Dont waste your time Or too much time for that matter, i could not tell you how many hours i have spent on this app in one sitting on the toilet

Working well now All bugs have been worked out and I can now happily waste my time on this app instead of being a productive member of society

Thanks, Imgur. They haven't added favorite folders to imgur even though everyone is asking for them, now they've updated the app with no improvements and pop-up ads. Don't update, problem solved.

Mhmm, it's that good Whilst operating as a mildly young intergenerationally challenged offspring of ancestors in a cold, desolate world, there are few things that can bring a glimmer of hope to my otherwise intrepidly bleak day-to-day affairs. However, I simply had to write a message on my typewriter to give to my personal stenographer who I insisted write this review verbatim, that this app has, at a constant and exponential rate, caused a man to potentially see hope and happiness in the world through the lens of interconnectivity. Sure, there could be issues such as the app crashing at obscure and incredibly inconvenient moments, but that simply adds to the flare and fanfare offered up by the unequivocally gifted engineers who sacrifice time home with their 4 children who, day in and day out, hope for the moment that their family can return to them so that they could all maybe, just maybe, have a hot meal to enjoy in the company of those few who are loved by one another but noooo we just had to spring for a household upgrade so now we both have to ceaselessly work ourselves into our own graves whilst sacrificing the joys of life for a minimal stipend just to pay the mortgage.. But we are getting off topic Sharon so cut that part out; for this ethereal shrine of wonder. I can only hope to behold marvels such as apps of this nature in my remaining years on this seemingly doomed planet and pass down the knowledge of banana for scale to my futuristic and totally cool, obviously, legacies. 5/7: best app ever.
